about_the_game:
A cute little sheep inhabiting your desktop!
New version - now with Twitch plugin - information at the bottom of the page.

Discover an enchanting world right on your screen! Meet our adorable animated sheep who is full of curiosity and adventure. With its fluffy white wool and adorable beady eyes, it will bring a smile to your face.

Our animated sheep is no ordinary creature. It sometimes falls on your open window with a parachute and sometimes without and explores your icons full of joy. Watch how it happily jumps over the windows with its little hooves and spreads a cheerful mood. You will be surprised how it sits down, winks and even lies down to sleep as if it were a real sheep.

But the animated sheep also has its whims. It may decide to run out of the screen and disappear for a while to recharge its batteries. But don't worry! It always returns full of joy and excitement after exploring the world outside the screen. It has made new friends and seen exciting landscapes.

Get excited by the fascinating presence of our animated sheep! It will become your charming companion on the desktop, bringing a smile to your face and providing you with pure entertainment. Don't miss the chance to take part in his exciting adventures.

Dive into the world of the animated sheep and make your desktop a place of wonder and joy. Get our animated sheep today and live an unparalleled on-screen experience!


Features:
>>> you can select between 1 and 99 sheeps
>>> start at boot
>>> transparent area around the mouse pointer for undisturbed work
>>> menu in four languages
>>> screenshot function

The sheep can do:
>>> walk around
>>> chill
>>> eat
>>> sleep
>>> run
>>> use a helicopter
>>> use a rocket
>>> can change color
>>> have parachutes in different colors
>>> use balloons to fly away
>>> make bubbles
>>> can play with a ball
>>> have weather effects like clouds, sun and rainbow
>>> and can be dragged and dropped

You can en/disable your prefered animations and settings in the options menu.

##### Now with Twitch Plugin #####


Integrate eSheep into your stream and let the sheep show the messages of the chat participants while they run over your livestream.
The stream plugin includes the Twitch chatbot and an advanced options menu to customize the performance and display in the broadcasting software according to your own preferences.

The Twitch plugin has the following functions:
  • Guided integration of the eSheep into Twitch with step-by-step instructions.
  • The required keys are generated on your own PC - no external services (except Twitch) required.
  • The number of sheep on the screen can either be preset or dynamically adjusted to the number of participants in the chat.
  • The fonts and sizes used to display the names and messages of the chat participants can be freely selected. Their display duration can also be set.
  • The color of the displayed participant name can either be taken from the Twitch settings or chosen by the user.
  • For better readability, a small cloud is placed behind the name. This can be deactivated or replaced with your own image.
  • The written messages can be packed in a speech bubble. The displayed width and maximum number of lines can also be changed. The colors of the speech bubble can also be adjusted. Of course, the display of messages can also be completely deactivated.
  • You can exclude user names, e.g. to prevent the display of texts from another bot. You can also ban specific words.
  • If a moderator has to delete a message in the chat, it will also disappear in eSheep.
  • Positioning of the participant name either above or below the sheep. The speech bubble can also be aligned as desired.

Optimizations for the broadcasting software:
  • It is possible to switch to a window mode with different selectable resolutions.
  • You can make adjustments to the width and height of the entire display as well as changes to the playback speed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 2,5 Ghz
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: yes - runs with resolution 1280*800
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 or eqivalent
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 or eqivalent - resolution 1920*1080 and up
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
